TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException extends System.InvalidOperationException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when a resource reference key cannot be found during parsing or serialization of markup extension resources.
